description: A default user roles group for all users which allows viewing and managing a user's own user account

description: A default roles group for all users which allows applying for, viewing, and managing a user's own accounts, cards, loans, and transactions

authorities.description: A role which allows a user to apply for cards
A role which allows a user to create transactions for their own accounts

A role which allows a user to edit some fields of their own accounts

A role which allows a user to view their own accounts
A role which allows a user to view their own cards
A role which allows a user to view their own loans
A role which allows a user to edit some fields of their own cards
A role which allows a user to apply for accounts
A role which allows a user to edit some fields of their own account transactions
A role which allows a user to edit allowed fields of their own loans
A role which allows a user to view their own account transactions
